item.description:
ANT-4

#Description The ANT/4 is a low-noise magnetic field sensor designed for magnetotelluric investigations and other applications where measurements of the field at frequencies below 1 Hz are required. Using Triple-Nested magnetic feedback amplifier technology and including carefully designed mu-metal cores, this antenna is designed to be a highly flexible instrument, built to withstand the difficult conditions encountered in the field environment.

##Specifications

###Dimensions: Length: 138.0 cm ( 54.0 in) Diameter: 4.8 cm ( 1.875 in) Weight: 6.2 kg ( 13.5 lb)
